page.title: 15WHITGREAVE A LOCAL VILLAGE.
page.content: Types of recreational activities are wide-spread,ranging from gardening to aerobics,chess,fishing,squashand bowls.Church going is not popular:there is no resident vicar,so a weekly service is taken by a visiting vicar from Stafford.Half the population use Credit cards.The majority of houses have daily papers delivered;the post reaches them all.One house has wine delivered,4 have bread,7 have eggs and 4 have main order goods. Within the village ,there are three farms.Two of these are mainly dairy,the other is a poultry farm which has an output of about 1000 eggs per day.Around the village,most fields are used for grazing,though there is a small amount of arable ,growing wheat.barley and oilseed rape.
